requirements_detail.requirement: Real-time data ingestion from multiple sources (APIs, databases, streaming)
requirements_detail.notes: Native connectors for 200+ data sources

requirements_detail.requirement: Support for SQL and NoSQL data sources
requirements_detail.notes: Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, and more

requirements_detail.requirement: Automated ETL pipeline creation with visual designer
requirements_detail.notes: Drag-and-drop pipeline builder included

requirements_detail.requirement: Change data capture (CDC) for real-time sync
requirements_detail.notes: CDC supported for major databases; some require custom configuration
requirements_detail.mitigation: Document supported CDC sources; provide configuration guide for non-standard sources

requirements_detail.requirement: Interactive dashboard creation with drag-and-drop
requirements_detail.notes: Full drag-and-drop dashboard builder with 50+ chart types

requirements_detail.requirement: Embedded analytics with white-labeling support
requirements_detail.notes: Full embedding SDK with CSS customization

requirements_detail.requirement: Natural language query interface for business users
requirements_detail.notes: NLQ feature on roadmap for Q3 2026
requirements_detail.mitigation: Share roadmap timeline; offer guided query builder as interim solution

requirements_detail.requirement: Predictive analytics and ML model integration
requirements_detail.notes: Python/R integration available; no built-in ML models
requirements_detail.mitigation: Demonstrate Python integration for custom models; provide example notebooks

requirements_detail.requirement: Role-based access control (RBAC) with row-level security
requirements_detail.notes: Granular RBAC with row-level and column-level security

requirements_detail.requirement: SOC 2 Type II certification
requirements_detail.notes: Current SOC 2 Type II report available upon NDA

requirements_detail.requirement: Data encryption at rest and in transit (AES-256, TLS 1.3)
requirements_detail.notes: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit, customer-managed keys supported

requirements_detail.requirement: HIPAA compliance for healthcare data handling
requirements_detail.notes: HIPAA BAA not currently offered
requirements_detail.mitigation: Evaluate HIPAA certification timeline with compliance team; consider data masking as interim

requirements_detail.requirement: Horizontal scaling to handle 10B+ rows
requirements_detail.notes: Distributed query engine scales to 50B+ rows

requirements_detail.requirement: Sub-second query response for cached dashboards
requirements_detail.notes: Intelligent caching layer with <500ms p95 for cached queries

requirements_detail.requirement: Multi-region deployment with data residency controls
requirements_detail.notes: US and EU regions available; APAC region in beta
requirements_detail.mitigation: Confirm customer region requirements; provide APAC beta access if needed

requirements_detail.requirement: RESTful API with comprehensive documentation
requirements_detail.notes: Full REST API with OpenAPI spec and interactive documentation

requirements_detail.requirement: Webhook support for event-driven workflows
requirements_detail.notes: Webhook support for 30+ event types

requirements_detail.requirement: Custom plugin/extension framework
requirements_detail.notes: Plugin framework on roadmap for Q4 2026
requirements_detail.mitigation: Current API extensibility covers most use cases; plugin framework will expand options

requirements_detail.requirement: 24/7 enterprise support with 1-hour critical response time
requirements_detail.notes: Premium support tier includes 24/7 coverage with 30-min critical response SLA

requirements_detail.requirement: Dedicated customer success manager
requirements_detail.notes: Included in Enterprise tier

requirements_detail.requirement: On-premise deployment option
requirements_detail.notes: Cloud-only platform; no on-premise offering
requirements_detail.mitigation: Position cloud-first architecture benefits; offer VPC deployment as alternative
